name: AI Colony
description:
20XX

Humanity has set its sights for colonizing Europa. They sent probes to set up base camps on the surface and underground oceans to scout and prepare it for terraforming, but they all mysteriously disappeared before establishing contact. Many people suspected that aliens were behind this. Thus, a new probe with defensive measures was sent. It's called Robot Colony Model Z-001(R.C Z-001). It contained weaponized defense bots and resource collecting collector bots. It survived long enough to establish a connection to Earth. You are in a nearby support spaceship, you must assist in expanding the system using the nearby resources and occasional airstrikes until the foreign threat can be automatically dealt with and then we may proceed to Phase II.

 AI Colony

How to play

Eliminate threats with Defender Bots

Collect resources with Collector Bots

Upgrades and Power-Ups are available using the aforementioned resources
